data.lyric:
[ti:DND (Explicit)]
[ar:Polo G]
[al:DND (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]DND (Explicit) - Polo G
[00:03.78]Lyrics by：Taurus Bartlett/Dewayne Kennemer
[00:07.56]Composed by：Taurus Bartlett/Dewayne Kennemer
[00:11.34]Once we start a riot we can't keep quiet
[00:13.55]Quiet
[00:14.25]We want all the smoke f**k the peace signs
[00:16.57]Sign
[00:17.25]All gas no brakes we just gon' keep slidin' ayy
[00:20.43]Glock cook a n***a he get deepfried
[00:22.78]Snakes in the grass watch out for rats and all the feline
[00:25.89]I cut everybody off keep hittin' decline
[00:28.68]I swear these painkillers got me on the deep vibe
[00:31.53]Miss the old days got me wishin' I could rewind
[00:35.48]Make sure my phone on DND I keep my door closed
[00:38.31]I been tryna put the rap game in a chokehold
[00:41.31]Diamonds VVS' Gucci cuban color rose gold
[00:44.69]We got w**d pills and lean by the boatload
[00:47.45]Don't stop at red lights we stuck in go-mode
[00:50.44]They killin' kids wonder why the summer so cold
[00:53.45]When your face pop up in my head all I can say is "D**n"
[00:56.44]Don't try to test us say hell like we won't ace exam
[00:59.04]For one night she gon' turn up to this song like it's her favorite jam
[01:02.44]And now I slide in that X7 'fore I take the Lamb'
[01:05.25]Critiquing all my movements type of s**t that make me hate the 'Gram
[01:08.37]Know I'm not perfect just accept me for the way I am
[01:11.25]Once we start a riot we can't keep quiet
[01:13.58]Quiet
[01:14.43]We want all the smoke f**k the peace signs
[01:16.56]Sign
[01:17.24]All gas no brakes we just gon' keep slidin' ayy
[01:19.90]Slidin'
[01:20.58]Glock cook a n***a he get deepfried
[01:22.73]Snakes in the grass watch out for rats and all the feline
[01:25.91]I cut everybody off keep hittin' decline
[01:28.70]I swear these painkillers got me on the deep vibe
[01:31.64]Miss the old days got me wishin' I could rewind
[01:34.69]Had to make some plays up in that field b***h we got tired of fumblin'
[01:37.67]Hot numb to shorties who stuck up like who gon' slide or somethin'
[01:40.68]My n***as won't play they hawk s**t down 'til you get tired of runnin'
[01:43.64]He tripped and fell they stood over him and that .9 was dumpin'
[01:46.68]Like taco night we leave them shells sittin' inside your stomach
[01:49.69]Story the same you know the usual we die for nothin'
[01:52.66]I dressed up for too many funerals I'm tired of comin'
[01:55.68]Made it out that s**t but it left scars I'm still survivin' from it
[01:58.67]All of them bad thoughts just tore me down
[02:00.30]Feel like my mind was crumblin'
[02:01.68]I just want all this s**t figured out I swear I'm tired of wonderin'
[02:04.63]Just 'cause y'all rep the same thang don't mean them guys a hunnid
[02:07.63]I come from starvin' fightin' cases now I'm flyin' to London
[02:11.34]Once we start a riot we can't keep quiet
[02:13.56]Quiet
[02:14.39]We want all the smoke f**k the peace signs
[02:16.55]Sign
[02:17.19]All gas no brakes we just gon' keep slidin' ayy
[02:19.81]Slidin'
[02:20.45]Glock cook a n***a he get deepfried
[02:22.73]Snakes in the grass watch out for rats and all the feline
[02:25.90]I cut everybody off keep hittin' decline
[02:28.69]I swear these painkillers got me on the deep vibe
[02:31.39]Miss the old days got me wishin' I could rewind
data.trans:
[ti:DND (Explicit)]
[ar:Polo G]
[al:DND (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:03.78]//
[00:07.56]//
[00:11.34]一旦我们躁动起来 我们就无法安静下来
[00:13.55]安静
[00:14.25]我们就是要大吵大闹 去他的和平吧
[00:16.57]和平
[00:17.25]全速前进 片刻不停 我们就是要不停冲锋
[00:20.43]用格洛克手枪消灭那些碍眼的家伙
[00:22.78]阴险小人在暗处 小心叛徒 还有那些狡诈之人
[00:25.89]我拒绝接见所有人 谁都别来打扰我
[00:28.68]这些止痛药 让我感觉真的很奇妙
[00:31.53]怀念那些旧时光 我真希望可以逆转时间
[00:35.48]把手机设置成勿扰模式 家门关起来
[00:38.31]我想在说唱行业闯出点成绩来
[00:41.31]晶莹剔透的钻石 古驰衣服 玫瑰金的古巴链
[00:44.69]我们有各种各样的好东西 车载斗量
[00:47.45]红灯也不停 我们已经无法止步
[00:50.44]他们杀害孩子 不知道为什么 夏天竟然这样寒冷
[00:53.45]当你的脸出现在我的脑海里 我能说的只有一个词 可恶
[00:56.44]不要考验我们 不要以为我们没胆量
[00:59.04]就一个晚上 她就会迷上这首歌 好像这是她最爱的果酱
[01:02.44]现在我开着宝马X7 很快我就会开上兰博基尼
[01:05.25]我做什么都有人批评 这种事情让我开始讨厌网络了
[01:08.37]要知道我也不完美 接受我本来的样子吧
[01:11.25]一旦我们躁动起来 我们就无法安静下来
[01:13.58]安静
[01:14.43]我们就是要大吵大闹 去他的和平吧
[01:16.56]和平
[01:17.24]全速前进 片刻不停 我们就是要不停冲锋
[01:19.90]冲锋
[01:20.58]用格洛克手枪消灭那些碍眼的家伙
[01:22.73]阴险小人在暗处 小心叛徒 还有那些狡诈之人
[01:25.91]我拒绝接见所有人 谁都别来打扰我
[01:28.70]这些止痛药 让我感觉真的很奇妙
[01:31.64]怀念那些旧时光 我真希望可以逆转时间
[01:34.69]必须在这行业搞出点动静来 碧池 我们受够了默默无闻
[01:37.67]那些姑娘 我们都不屑一顾 谁要来跟我混
[01:40.68]我的兄弟们不会闹着玩 他们都像猎鹰一样追捕你们 直到你们跑不动为止
[01:43.64]他跌倒了 他们就把他踩在脚下 枪声四起
[01:46.68]就像塔可之夜 我们把子弹留在你的肚子里
[01:49.69]同样的故事 你知道这些都是家常便饭 我们常常会无故死去
[01:52.66]我参加了太多葬礼 我已经厌倦了这样的场面
[01:55.68]终于打拼出来了 但我身上已经伤痕累累 我依然在挣扎
[01:58.67]那些可怕的想法让我崩溃
[02:00.30]感觉我的心在渐渐崩塌
[02:01.68]我只想搞明白这一切 真的烦透了困惑不解的状态
[02:04.63]虽然你们都做着同样的事情 但那些家伙并不一定是真心的
[02:07.63]以前的我吃不起饭 官司打不完 如今我要飞去伦敦了
[02:11.34]一旦我们躁动起来 我们就无法安静下来
[02:13.56]安静
[02:14.39]我们就是要大吵大闹 去他的和平吧
[02:16.55]和平
[02:17.19]全速前进 片刻不停 我们就是要不停冲锋
[02:19.81]冲锋
[02:20.45]用格洛克手枪消灭那些碍眼的家伙
[02:22.73]阴险小人在暗处 小心叛徒 还有那些狡诈之人
[02:25.90]我拒绝接见所有人 谁都别来打扰我
[02:28.69]这些止痛药 让我感觉真的很奇妙
[02:31.39]怀念那些旧时光 我真希望可以逆转时间
